text-align: center;\"><object width=\"320\" height=\"266\" class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://0.gvt0.com/vi/yy43zYo33Dg/0.jpg\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/yy43zYo33Dg&fs=1&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://www.youtube.com/v/yy43zYo33Dg&fs=1&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\"></embed></object></div><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%; margin: 0in 0in 10pt;\"><span lang=\"EN\" style=\"color: #333333; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%; mso-ansi-language: EN;\">All genuine criticism of Zionism is automatically branded and disqualified as \"Anti-Semitism\", \"Discrimination\".  All public debate on the political abuse and misuse of \"The Holocaust\" is branded as \"Revisionist Denial\", \"Antisemitism\", \"Hate Mongering\", etc... This is all tantamount to Intellectual Terrorism.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZqQPobzdDN4/TsIgxTGsEBI/AAAAAAAAIZY/7aHNHu5zCE8/s1600/imagesCAY8YUI6.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-ZqQPobzdDN4/TsIgxTGsEBI/AAAAAAAAIZY/7aHNHu5zCE8/s400/imagesCAY8YUI6.jpg\" width=\"330\" /></a></div><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><o:p><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">&nbsp; </span></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: red; font-family: &quot;Trebuchet MS&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: x-large; mso-bidi-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; mso-fareast-font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\"><div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: left;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">HERE IS SOMETHING ABOUT THE WILY SENIOR BHUSHAN\u2014 WHO&nbsp;WANTED INCOME TAX REBATE BECAUSE HIS HEART WAS A PLANT ( SIC!)</span></span></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">The Delhi High Court has rejected the claim of Senior Advocate Shanti Bhushan that his heart is a \u2018Plant\u2019. The Delhi High Court emotionally said \u201cNo two individuals deal with matters of heart similarly; often confounded, as to how to deal with it \u2013 which is why a famous lyricists expounds on this very peculiar quandary thus: DIL-E-NADAN TUJHE HUA KYA HAI AKHIR ESS DARD KE DAWA KYA HAI. (Here heart is personified. It is asked of it what ails it? What is the remedy for the malady).\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">The events leading to the case are as follows. In the assessment year 1983-84, Shanti Bhushan had filed an income tax return declaring a total income of Rs 2,15,520/-. This return was later revised and in that, he had claimed as expense a sum of Rs. 1,74,000/- incurred by him on coronary surgery performed on him in Houston, USA.<o:p></o:p></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">Mr. Bhushan claimed waiver under Section 31 of the Income Tax Act (IT Act) which, inter-alia permits deduction of expenditure incurred on current repairs of plant. His stand was that a human heart is in the nature of a \u2018plant\u2019 and therefore the expenditure incurred by him on the coronary surgery was akin to expenses incurred on current repairs of a plant.<o:p></o:p></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">The Assessing Officer rejected the claim under Section 31 and Section 37 of the I.T. Act. An appeal was filed before the Commissioner of Income Tax (CIT) against the order of the Assessing Officer. The CIT upheld the order of the Assessing Officer. Aggrieved by this, further appeal was filed before the Income Tax Appellate Tribunal (ITAT) by Shanthi Bhushan.<o:p></o:p></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">The Tribunal also rejected the claim under Section 31 relying on the test laid down by the Gujarat High Court in the case of CIT vs. Elecon Engineering Co. Ltd. (1974) 96 ITR 672 (Guj.). It said \u201cfor the expenses incurred on the repair of the plant to be allowed, the assessee would have to demonstrably show that the plant was used as a \u201ctool\u201d with which he carried out his business or professional activity.\u201d The Tribunal came to the conclusion that the assessee could not have demonstrated that heart was used as a \u201ctool of his trade\u201d since the heart was even otherwise an organ, essential for normal and healthy functioning of a human body, and not necessarily for a professional, such as a lawyer.<o:p></o:p></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">An appeal was filed before the Delhi High Court, which was also rejected. The court held that \u201cFirstly if the heart of a human being, as in the case of the assessee, were to be considered a plant, it would necessarily mean that it is an asset which should have found a mention in the assessee\u2019s balance sheet of the previous year in issue, as also, in the earlier years. Apart from the fact that this is admittedly not so, the difficulty that the assessee would face in showing the same in his books of accounts would be of arriving at the cost of acquisition of such an asset. Therefore, in our view before expenses on repair of plant are admitted as a deduction, the plant would necessarily have to be reflected as an asset in the books of accounts. The second ground on which, we are persuaded by the counsel for the revenue not to accept the assessee\u2019s claim is that, even if one were to give the widest meaning to the word \u2018plant\u2019 under Section 31 of the IT Act, human heart would still not fall within the definition of the word plant.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\">The Delhi High Court observed that \u201cthe question raised is the product of experience, deftness and obvious artfulness of the petitioner who is a seasoned, experienced and an eminent Advocate of the country.\u201d We will have to wait and watch if Shanthi Bhushan will prefer an appeal to the Apex Court against the Delhi HC\u2019s order. <o:p></o:p></span></div><span style=\"color: black; font-family: Times New Roman; font-size: small;\">  </span><br />\n<div style=\"background: white; line-height: 18pt; text-align: justify;\"><span style=\"color: #353535; font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Mr. Bhushan WITH HIS <span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">LYING HEART OF PLANT</span> is now part of Anna Hazare\u2019s gruesome foursome team. This man is worth hundreds of crores--just see his mindset to save peanuts as IT refund. </span></span></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Arial&quot;,&quot;sans-serif&quot;; font-size: 9pt;\"><span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: large;\">How come crores of poor Indians who had heart attacks , never had this bizarre brainwave? Are we to trust this diabolical man -- has Amar Singh not given enough warning?</span></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: Arial; font-size: large;\">Do NOT disturb Anna Hazare-- he and his gruesome foursome team is now busy collecting crores of CHANDA DONATIONS and laundering it in their NGOs. Kerjriwal being ex-IRS knows how to do it.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-k66Cu3j6KQc/TthHw4RpqaI/AAAAAAAAJUc/ivjag33HJ0Y/s1600/I+am+Kejriwal.jpeg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"278\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-k66Cu3j6KQc/TthHw4RpqaI/AAAAAAAAJUc/ivjag33HJ0Y/s400/I+am+Kejriwal.jpeg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: Arial; font-size: large;\">Anna Hazare the truck driver, is no Mahatma .
